item.title: What is Markdown?
item.description: An alternative way to style a text document for readability and portability.
item.content:encoded: An alternative way to style a text document for readability and portability.

item.title: How to reduce decision fatigue as a digital nomad
item.description: How to optimize decision making on your next workation. Sharing my experience after living in more than 8 countries.
item.content:encoded: How to optimize decision making on your next workation. Sharing my experience after living in more than 8 countries.

item.title: From VSCode to Neovim, is it worth it?
item.description: Trying out Vim is something every Software Engineer should do at some point, however when it comes to replacing your VSCode or your favorite IDE it is not that simple.
item.content:encoded: Trying out Vim is something every Software Engineer should do at some point, however when it comes to replacing your VSCode or your favorite IDE it is not that simple.
item.author: abdurashid@outlook.com (Abdurashid Abarov)
